Author: fishonthesun
Text: Ask her how she is feeling. It will suck, but honesty will really help here. If she's especially concerned about you but not feeling triggered herself, ask her if you can vent to her. Having someone to reach out to if you want to binge or did binge and want to purge can be so helpful   I hope you get it figured out <3

Author: snefferu
Text: If you trigger her it’s not your fault. She’ll only be triggered if she’s already susceptible. I’ve never been triggered by other destructive behaviors that I’m not susceptible to, I only get triggered by something if I already had a problem with it myself
